name: Formula 2
description:
Welcome to Formula 2! In the age-old sporting event, we travel back in time to the 10th century, the quarter-ages! And, using similar technology to the times, we blow stuff up! Let's get going!   


Controls

Keyboard & mouse:

  • wasd to move 
  • mouse to aim 
  • left click to fire

Xbox controller:

  • left stick to move 
  • right stick to aim
  • RB to fire

Music by Monotron
https://chipmusic.org/monotron/music/its-not-unusual
